text: Vasili Vyacheslavovich Blagov (; 29 October 1954 âˆ’ 9 May 2019) was a Russian pair skater. He competed for the Soviet Union. He and partner Irina Cherniaeva finished 6th at the 1972 Winter Olympics. He finished first at the Soviet Championships in 1972, and second in 1973. With Natalia Dongauzer, he won the silver medal at the 1973 Prize of Moscow News. He was born in Moscow. Blagov died on 9 May 2019, at the age of 64. ==References== ==Other websites== *Vasili Blagov at Sports-Reference.com Category:1954 births Category:2019 deaths Category:1972 Winter Olympics Category:Russian figure skaters Category:Soviet figure skaters Category:Sportspeople from Moscow
title: Vasili Blagov
